text: I Lost My Heart on a Bus (German: Ich hab mein Herz im Autobus verloren) is a 1929 German silent comedy film directed by Carlo Campogalliani and Domenico Gambino and starring Domenico Gambino, Truus Van Aalten and Lydia Potechina.Krautz p.31 The title is a reference to a popular song I Lost My Heart in Heidelberg. It was made in Italy. ==Cast== * Domenico Gambino as Dorrit * Truus Van Aalten as Tommy * Lydia Potechina * Robert Garrison * Philipp Manning * Karl Harbacher * Karl Junge-Swinburne * Margarete Sachse ==References== ==Bibliography== * Alfred Krautz.
